artifacts.title: Master Prompt for AI-Facilitated Strategic Project Kickoff
artifacts.summary: A comprehensive, structured master prompt for an AI to facilitate strategic project kickoff sessions, intended for use by the ContextVibes CLI 'kickoff' command.
usageGuidance: This is the primary template used by 'contextvibes kickoff' in strategic mode.
It guides an LLM to conduct a detailed project initiation interview, including definition, technical deep-dive, and planning.
The LLM will use this prompt to ask structured questions and instruct the user on related contextvibes CLI commands.
